title: A Clockwork Orange
description: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

title: The French Connection
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: A pair of New York City cops in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a drug smuggling job with a French connection.

title: Dirty Harry
description: When a madman calling himself 'the Scorpio Killer' menaces the city, tough as nails San Francisco Police Inspector 'Dirty' Harry Callahan is assigned to track down and stop him.

title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
description: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of a wondrous, magical chocolate factory.

title: The Last Picture Show
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: In a small, dying Texas town in the 1950s, two best friends navigate their way through love, loss, and the challenges of growing up.

title: Fiddler on the Roof
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring Adaptation and Original Song Score
description: In a small Jewish shtetl in turn-of-the-century Russia, a poor milkman is determined to find good husbands for his five daughters.

title: Shaft
description: Cool black private eye John Shaft is hired by a crime lord to find and retrieve his kidnapped daughter.

title: Harold and Maude
description: A young man obsessed with death forms an unlikely friendship with a life-affirming 80-year-old woman.

title: Klute
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A small-town detective searching for a missing man has only one lead: a connection with a New York prostitute.

title: Get Carter
description: A London gangster travels to his hometown to investigate his brother's death and uncovers a web of corruption.

title: McCabe & Mrs. Miller
description: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West town and their enterprise thrives, but they face a challenge from a powerful mining company.

title: Diamonds Are Forever
description: A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to a plot by his old nemesis Ernst Stavro Blofeld to use a space-based laser weapon.

title: Straw Dogs
description: A young American and his English wife come to rural England and face increasingly vicious harassment from the locals.

title: Play Misty for Me
description: A radio disc jockey has a casual affair with an obsessive fan, who begins to stalk him.

title: Carnal Knowledge
description: The story of two men and their sexual attitudes and experiences from their college days to middle age.

title: Bananas
production_studio: Jack Rollins & Charles H. Joffe Productions
description: A neurotic New Yorker, after being dumped by his activist girlfriend, travels to a tiny Latin American nation and becomes involved in its latest rebellion.

title: Walkabout
production_studio: Max L. Raab-Si Litvinoff Film Production
description: Two young siblings are stranded in the Australian outback and are helped by a young Aboriginal boy on his 'walkabout'.

title: THX 1138
description: In a dystopian future, a man and a woman rebel against their rigidly controlled society.

title: Sunday Bloody Sunday
description: A London doctor and a divorcée are involved in a love triangle with a bisexual artist.

title: The Andromeda Strain
description: A team of scientists investigates a deadly extraterrestrial microorganism that has crashed to Earth.

title: Vanishing Point
description: A former race car driver and Vietnam veteran tries to deliver a car from Denver to San Francisco in 15 hours, with the police in hot pursuit.

title: Escape from the Planet of the Apes
description: Two intelligent chimpanzees from the future travel back in time to 1970s America.

title: The Go-Between
description: A young boy becomes a messenger between a beautiful young woman and a farmer, but their forbidden love has tragic consequences.

title: Death in Venice
description: A composer vacationing in Venice becomes obsessed with the beauty of a young boy.

title: Summer of '42
description: The coming-of-age story of a teenage boy who has a summer romance with an older woman whose husband is away at war.

title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
description: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in WWII.

title: Nicholas and Alexandra
description: The story of the last Russian czar and his family.

title: A New Leaf
description: A spoiled, penniless playboy decides to marry a wealthy, clumsy heiress and then murder her.

title: The Hospital
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Story and Screenplay Based on Factual Material or Material Not Previously Published or Produced
description: A suicidal doctor in a chaotic New York City hospital finds a new reason to live when he falls in love with a patient's daughter.

title: The Omega Man
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a lone human survivor must fight off a horde of nocturnal mutants.

title: The Devils
description: In 17th-century France, a charismatic priest is accused of witchcraft by a sexually repressed nun.

title: Two-Lane Blacktop
description: Two men drag race across the American Southwest in a 1955 Chevy.

title: The Panic in Needle Park
description: A love story between two heroin addicts in New York City.

title: The Beguiled
description: During the Civil War, a wounded Union soldier is taken in by the women of a Southern girls' school, but his presence creates a web of sexual tension, jealousy, and deceit.

title: Billy Jack
description: A half-Indian, ex-Green Beret Vietnam veteran protects a progressive school from the racist and violent townspeople.

title: Johnny Got His Gun
description: A young American soldier is hit by an artillery shell on the last day of World War I, and he is left a quadruple amputee with no eyes, ears, mouth, or nose, but his mind still functions.

title: The Abominable Dr. Phibes
description: A disfigured, reclusive organist seeks revenge on the team of surgeons he blames for his wife's death.

title: A Touch of Zen
description: A fugitive noblewoman and a shy scholar find themselves on the run from a corrupt government official in this wuxia epic.

title: The Anderson Tapes
description: A career criminal plans to rob a luxury apartment building, unaware that he is being recorded by multiple surveillance systems.

title: Sweet Sweetback's Baadasssss Song
description: A black man goes on the run from the police after saving a Black Panther from a racist attack.

title: Willard
description: A meek social misfit befriends a group of rats and uses them to exact revenge on his tormentors.

title: The Decameron
description: An adaptation of nine stories from Boccaccio's 'The Decameron'.

title: The Last Run
description: An aging getaway driver takes on one last job, but he finds himself in over his head.

title: Kotch
description: An elderly man whose family is trying to put him in a nursing home runs away and befriends a pregnant teenager.

title: Mary, Queen of Scots
description: The story of the turbulent life of Mary, Queen of Scots, and her rivalry with her cousin, Queen Elizabeth I of England.

title: Valdez Is Coming
description: A Mexican-American lawman is forced to take on a powerful rancher and his hired guns.

title: Big Jake
description: An aging Texas cattleman goes after the kidnappers of his grandson.
